Description: Will ship worldwide - message me and I will check how much it will cost to ship it to you. Jackson DKMG Dinky used electric guitar with EMG HZ pickups, Floyd Rose Licensed tremolo and reversed headstock. Made in Japan. Guitar is in used condition, so it has some obvious nicks, dings and scratches (see the picks). Unfortunately back plate and tremolo arm are missing.Other than that the guitar is in perfect working order, no scratchy pots, switches or jacks. Tremolo works perfectly fine and holds tuning with ease. The EMG HZ pickups give the guitar nice and selective tone. Very good for hard rock and heavy metal. Recently set up with with brand new set of Ernie Ball 11-54 strings. The guitar will be safely packed for shipping. I am happy to answer any questions and will consider reasonable offers.Please check my other listings.Specs:Color: Transparent RedBody: Archtop Alder body with Flame Maple VeneerNeck: Bolt-on rock maple with scarf joint head stockNeck dimensions: 1st fret: .735", 12th fret: .810"Scale length: 25.5" (648mm)Width at nut: 1-11/16" (43mm)Fingerboard: Rosewood with compound 14" to 16" radiusNo. of frets: 24 jumbo fretsMOTO Piranha Tooth Position InlaysHeadstock: Reverse Jackson 6-In-Line Pointed Headstock, natural Ivoroid binding on neck and headstockBridge pickup: EMG HZNeck pickup: EMG HZControls: Master volume, master tonePickup Switching: 3-position bladeHardware: BlackBridge: Floyd Rose licensed Jackson low-profile JT580 LP double locking 2-point tremoloTuning machines: Sealed die-cast tuners
Title: Jackson Dinky DKMG Trans Red 2006 Made In Japan EMG Floyd Rose
